messageBody:
Steve Freeman wrote:

> From: "Mike Clark" <mike@...>
> > Is anyone aware of any book projects currently underway focusing
> > specifically on JUnit, and possibly also addressing integration with
> > Ant, Cactus, CruiseControl, etc.? I'm aware that Wiley has one book
> > currently available.
>
> which is that?
>

Java Tools for Extreme Programming
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/047120708X/qid=1006721776/sr=1-1/ref=sr_1_2_1/107-2300870-9577348

I've yet to read it myself, or hear a review.

Mike
